mainText.attr1: Ships WILL target enemy ships on their own
At first - targets are chosen just like in Engage setting (within combat range)
IF NOT FOUND - targets are chosen from within an ever expanding range
Example: if no targets found within 5k units, then search 10k units
This is a great mop up enemies setting.
When there are more friendly ships than enemy ships and enemy defenses are destroyed or not significant.
This setting is good on large areas of engagement.
Hop into a ship - and pilot it yourself. Your forces will engage on their own as well.
